title: my google pixel xl 2 was stolen and somone put bootleg firmware to by pass my google account
content: i tried completey restoring phone back to original settings but i think becuse of them installing bootleg firmware on my google phone it locked up my google account as well as other emails such as my hot mail. i tried restoring it to factory reset and restore to origina settings but now it just keeps asking for my google account associate with phone and then it says i changed my11 months go. then when i try to enter email and password it will sometimes take a while to load then it just goes back to the beginning. ive worked on it and tried  to figure out how to fix it but havent been able to succeed.its beyond frustraighting the bootleg software that the thief put on there says its samsung  software i am stuck and dont know if its even fixable plese help
